title: # 300 - Tim Dillon & ME
description:
My Special "Secret Time" will be available on Netflix August 24th!

Today I sit down with comedian Tim Dillon and we talk about Alex Jones, Nanette, My safety valet story, Tim's Netflix episode, and much more!

Check out Tim Dillon on Netflix's "The Comedy Lineup" episode 8.

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Go to www.omahasteaks.com and type “Bert” in the search bar and add the grill ready collection to your cart for only $39.99.

This episode is also brought to you by Policy Genius. Compare life insurance policies and more in just 5 min at www.policygenius.com 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
